messages.title: A Strong Local Voice for Durham
messages.content: My priorities for our local area include cutting Council costs, attracting new businesses, and securing more jobs.

messages.title: Securing Durham's Economy
messages.content: We need to secure Durham's recovery from the recession. We have the opportunity to build a better, brighter future for Durham.

messages.title: A Personal Message from Rebecca Coulson
messages.content: This election is about more than who represents us in Parliament. It's about the direction Durham will take over the next five years.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Rebecca Coulson wants to cut wasteful Council spending to keep Council Tax as low as possible and to fight against further increases.
Plans to attract new businesses to the Durham area and become a spokesperson for local businesses in an effort to secure more jobs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour have taken your vote for granted. This time, your vote really could make a difference.

issues.economy: We need to secure Durham's economy

housing.content: Cut wasteful Council spending to keep Council Tax as low as possible

leaflet.personalStatement: This election is about more than who represents us in Parliament. It's about the direction Durham will take over the next five years.

quotes.text: Labour have taken your vote for granted. This time, your vote really could make a difference.

images.caption: Rebecca Coulson in a local meeting
